text: MADURAI district is one of the 32 districts in Tamil Nadu, South India. Madurai district is the second largest district by population., United States National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency Madurai is the headquarters of this district. It is an important place for making movies. ==Population== According to 2011 census of India, Madurai district had a population of 3,038,252. The population was 2,578,201 in the 2001 census. This is a growth rate of 17.95%. The district had a sex-ratio of 990 females for every 1,000 males. This is up from 978 in 2001, and much above the national average of 929. ==Administrative divisions in Madurai district== The district of Madurai has 13 taluks and revenue blocks with the same boundaries and names. They are: # Thiruparankundram # T.Kallupatti # Tirumangalam # Kallikudi # Sedapatti # Usilampatti # Vadipatti # Melur # Madurai West # Madurai East # Kottampatti # Alanganallur # Chellampatti ==Tourist attractions in the district== * Madurai Meenakshi Amman temple * Thiruvathavur Thirumarainathar Temple * Alagar Koyil * Thirupparankundram Murugan Temple * Thirumalai Nayakar Mahal * 1000 pillar hall * Kazimar Big Mosque * Gandhi Memorial Museum *Pazhamudhircholai *Vandiyur Mariamman Temple ==References== Category:Madurai district
title: Madurai district
